name: Tic Tac Toe (itch) (Ev0gs)
description:
Tic Tac Toe

This game is my first true game I developed on my own by following youtube videos and fixing bug by my personal knowledge.

This project's goal is, for me, to learn new things about Unity and be more at ease with using Unity as a game engine, as well as coding video games.

I hope you'll enjoy it !

Feel free to give me some advices for future games !
